qas.question: What television station has its regional headquarters in Plymouth?
What regional ITV station serves Plymouth?
On what date did ITV Westcountry cease to operate?
With what channel did ITV Westcountry merge?
What BBC radio station operates in Plymouth?

context: Plymouth is the regional television centre of <a0_0>BBC South West<a0_0/>. A team of journalists are headquartered at Plymouth for the <a1_0><a3_0>ITV West<a3_0/> Country<a1_0/> regional station, after a merger with ITV West forced ITV Westcountry to close on <a2_0>16 February 2009<a2_0/>. The main local newspapers serving Plymouth are The Herald and Western Morning News with Radio Plymouth , <a4_0>BBC Radio Devon<a4_0/>, Heart South West , and Pirate FM being the main local radio stations.
